mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdminAuthorGrpMapng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , AUTHOR_GRP_SN , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_ADMIN_AUTHOR_GRP_MAPNG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AUTHOR_GRP_SN = #{authorGrpSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
